AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Laredo: destination to pick up commercial equipment
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Freer, Texas: location where an immigration checkpoint is situated and a stop occurred, also involved in a search of a tractor-trailer and prolonged stops
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: country of citizenship and location where aliens were transported
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.district court: court that denied Raymond McMillon's motion to suppress evidence, reviews factual findings for clear error and legal conclusions de novo, handles motions to dismiss on speedy trial grounds, and takes motions under advisement with a thirty-day period to rule, makes ends-of-justice findings on the record
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Supreme Court: recognized the constitutionality of suspicionless routine vehicle stops at immigration checkpoints
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.district court record: record of the case where ends-of-justice findings are set forth
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.speedy trial case: case where speedy trial determinations are reviewed
